languages.text: "Пока неизвестно. Дворянские семейства валят ответственность друг на друга. Агентура почтенного Ахиллеаса Скаландра, размещенная в Сципионе 84-249, героически погибла, спасая население от катастрофы. В их последних отчетах упоминается некая уязвимость индустриальных секторов нижнего улья, но без подробностей, и сейчас все ваши слуги заняты не расследованием причин кризиса, а борьбой с его последствиями".

"It is still unclear. The noble houses are casting blame on one another. Agents of the esteemed Achilleas Scalander stationed in Scipione 84-249 died heroically while trying to save the population from this disaster. Their final reports mentioned some vulnerabilities in the industrial sectors of the lower hive but did not go into further detail. All your servants are currently too busy dealing with the consequences of the crisis to investigate its causes."
languages.original_text: "Пока неизвестно. Дворянские семейства валят ответственность друг на друга. Агентура почтенного Ахиллеаса Скаландра, размещенная в Сципионе 84-249, героически погибла, спасая население от катастрофы. В их последних отчетах упоминается некая уязвимость индустриальных секторов нижнего улья, но без подробностей, и сейчас все ваши слуги заняты не расследованием причин кризиса, а борьбой с его последствиями".

traits.locale_text: "It is still unclear. Noble houses are laying the responsibility on each other. The agents of the venerable Achilleas Scalander, stationed on Scipione 84-249, have died heroically while saving the population from disaster. Their latest reports mention some vulnerability of the industrial sectors of the lower hive, but do not go into further detail, and all of your servants are now busy not with the investigation of the causes of the crisis, but with dealing with its consequences".

"It is still unclear. Noble houses are laying the responsibility on each other. The agents of the venerable Achilleas Scalander, stationed on Scipione 84-249, have died heroically while saving the population from disaster. Their latest reports mention some vulnerability of the industrial sectors of the lower hive, but do not go into further detail, and all of your servants are now busy not with the investigation of the causes of the crisis, but with dealing with its consequences".

All your servants are currently too busy dealing with the consequences of the crisis to investigate its causes."

"It is still unclear. The noble houses are throwing the blame at one another. Agents of the venerable Achilleas Scalander, stationed on Scipione 84-249, have died heroically while trying to save the population from this disaster. Their latest reports mention some vulnerabilities in the industrial sectors of the lower hive but do not go into further detail. Additionally, all of your servants are currently busy with investigating the causes of the crisis but are not doing anything to deal with its consequences".

Agents of the esteemed Achilleas Scalander stationed in Scipione 84-249 died heroically while trying to save the population from this disaster. Their final reports mentioned some vulnerabilities in the industrial sectors of the lower hive but did not go into further detail. All your servants are currently too busy dealing with the consequences of the crisis to investigate its causes."

languages.text: “目前我们还不清楚原因，那些贵族互相推卸责任。尊贵的阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德驻扎在希皮奥内84-249特工试图在灾难期间拯救幸存者，最终全部英勇牺牲。他们最终的报告提及了巢都底部工业区的部分缺陷，但并没有进行详细说明。此外，您所有的仆人都在忙于补救危机造成的后果，无暇调查这场危机的成因。”
languages.original_text: "It is still unclear. The noble houses are casting blame on one another. Agents of the esteemed Achilleas Scalander stationed in Scipione 84-249 died heroically while trying to save the population from this disaster. Their final reports mentioned some vulnerabilities in the industrial sectors of the lower hive but did not go into further detail. All your servants are currently too busy dealing with the consequences of the crisis to investigate its causes."

traits.locale_text: “目前我们还不清楚原因，那些贵族互相推卸责任。尊贵的阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德驻扎在希皮奥内84-249特工试图在灾难期间拯救幸存者，最终全部英勇牺牲。他们最终的报告提及了巢都底部工业区的部分缺陷，但并没有进行详细说明。此外，您所有的仆人都在忙于补救危机造成的后果，无暇调查这场危机的成因。”
“目前我们还不清楚原因，那些贵族互相推卸责任。尊贵的阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德驻扎在希皮奥内84-249特工试图在灾难期间拯救幸存者，最终全部英勇牺牲。他们最终的报告提及了巢都底部工业区的部分缺陷，但并没有进行详细说明。此外，您所有的仆人目前都在忙着调查这场危机的成因，但却没有采取任何措施应对已经酿成的后果。”

languages.text: «Todavía no está claro. Las casas nobles se culpan unas a otras. Agentes del venerable Achilleas Scalander, destacados en Escipión 84-249, murieron heroicamente al intentar salvar a la población de este desastre. Sus últimos informes mencionan algunas vulnerabilidades en los sectores industriales de la colmena inferior, pero no entran en más detalles. Todos sus sirvientes están demasiado ocupados haciendo frente a las consecuencias de la crisis para investigar sus causas».
languages.original_text: "It is still unclear. The noble houses are casting blame on one another. Agents of the esteemed Achilleas Scalander stationed in Scipione 84-249 died heroically while trying to save the population from this disaster. Their final reports mentioned some vulnerabilities in the industrial sectors of the lower hive but did not go into further detail. All your servants are currently too busy dealing with the consequences of the crisis to investigate its causes."

traits.locale_text: «Todavía no está claro. Las casas nobles se culpan unas a otras. Agentes del venerable Achilleas Scalander, destacados en Escipión 84-249, murieron heroicamente al intentar salvar a la población de este desastre. Sus últimos informes mencionan algunas vulnerabilidades en los sectores industriales de la colmena inferior, pero no entran en más detalles. Todos sus sirvientes están demasiado ocupados haciendo frente a las consecuencias de la crisis para investigar sus causas».

languages.text: 「いまだによく分からない。貴族たちは互いに責任をなすりつけ合っている。この災害から民を救おうと、サイピオーネ84-249に駐屯する由緒正しきアキレアス・スカランダーの諜報員が勇ましい死を遂げた。最新の報告書では、ハイヴ下部の産業セクターでの脆弱性についていくつか触れてあるが、それ以上の詳細は書かれていない。そのうえ、あなたの従者たちは皆、今回の危機の原因調査には取り組んでいるようだが、その結果については何ら対処していない」
languages.original_text: "It is still unclear. The noble houses are casting blame on one another. Agents of the esteemed Achilleas Scalander stationed in Scipione 84-249 died heroically while trying to save the population from this disaster. Their final reports mentioned some vulnerabilities in the industrial sectors of the lower hive but did not go into further detail. All your servants are currently too busy dealing with the consequences of the crisis to investigate its causes."

traits.locale_text: 「いまだによく分からない。貴族は互いに責任をなすりつけ合っている。この災害から民を救おうと、サイピオーネ84-249に駐屯する由緒正しきアキレアス・スカランダーの諜報員が勇ましい死を遂げた。最新の報告書では、ハイヴ下部の産業セクターでの脆弱性についていくつか触れてあるが、それ以上の詳細は書かれていない。そのうえ、あなたの従者たちは皆、今回の危機の原因調査には取り組んでいるようだが、その結果については何ら対処していない」

「いまだによく分からない。貴族は互いに責任をなすりつけ合っている。この災害から民を救おうと、サイピオーネ84-249に駐屯する由緒正しきアキレアス・スカランダーの諜報員が勇ましい死を遂げた。最新の報告書では、ハイヴ下部の産業セクターでの脆弱性についていくつか触れてあるが、それ以上の詳細は書かれていない。そのうえ、あなたの従者たちは皆、今回の危機の原因調査には取り組んでいるようだが、その結果については何ら対処していない」

languages.text: « Nul ne le sait exactement. Les maisons nobles se rejettent la faute et les agents de l'estimé Achilleas Scalander, postés sur Scipione 84-249, sont morts héroïquement en tentant de sauver la population du désastre. Leurs derniers rapports mentionnent certaines faiblesses dans les secteurs industriels de la ruche inférieure, mais sans donner plus de détails. Tous vos serviteurs sont trop occupés à gérer les conséquences de cette catastrophe pour enquêter sur ses causes. »
languages.original_text: "It is still unclear. The noble houses are casting blame on one another. Agents of the esteemed Achilleas Scalander stationed in Scipione 84-249 died heroically while trying to save the population from this disaster. Their final reports mentioned some vulnerabilities in the industrial sectors of the lower hive but did not go into further detail. All your servants are currently too busy dealing with the consequences of the crisis to investigate its causes."

traits.locale_text: « Nul ne le sait exactement. Les maisons nobles se rejettent la faute et les agents de l'estimé Achilleas Scalander, postés sur Scipione 84-249, sont morts héroïquement en tentant de sauver la population du désastre. Leurs derniers rapports mentionnent certaines faiblesses dans les secteurs industriels de la ruche inférieure, mais sans donner plus de détails. Tous vos serviteurs sont trop occupés à gérer les conséquences de cette catastrophe pour enquêter sur ses causes. »

languages.text: "Es ist noch unklar. Die Adelshäuser geben sich gegenseitig die Schuld. Agenten des geschätzten Achilleas Scalander, die in Scipione 84-249 stationiert waren, sind bei dem heldenhaften Versuch gestorben, die Bevölkerung vor einer Katastrophe zu bewahren. Ihre letzten Berichte erwähnen gewisse Schwächen in den industriellen Sektoren der unteren Makropole, gehen aber nicht ins Detail. Derzeit sind alle unsere Diener mit den Folgen der Krise beschäftigt und haben keine Zeit, ihre Ursachen zu ermitteln."
languages.original_text: "It is still unclear. The noble houses are casting blame on one another. Agents of the esteemed Achilleas Scalander stationed in Scipione 84-249 died heroically while trying to save the population from this disaster. Their final reports mentioned some vulnerabilities in the industrial sectors of the lower hive but did not go into further detail. All your servants are currently too busy dealing with the consequences of the crisis to investigate its causes."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist noch unklar. Die Adelshäuser geben sich gegenseitig die Schuld. Agenten des geschätzten Achilleas Scalander, die in Scipione 84-249 stationiert waren, sind bei dem heldenhaften Versuch gestorben, die Bevölkerung vor einer Katastrophe zu bewahren. Ihre letzten Berichte erwähnen gewisse Schwächen in den industriellen Sektoren der unteren Makropole, gehen aber nicht ins Detail. Derzeit sind alle unsere Diener mit den Folgen der Krise beschäftigt und haben keine Zeit, ihre Ursachen zu ermitteln."

"Es ist noch unklar. Die Adelshäuser geben sich gegenseitig die Schuld. Agenten des ehrenwerten Achilleas Scalander, die auf Scipione 84-249 stationiert waren, sind bei dem heldenhaften Versuch gestorben, die Bevölkerung vor einer Katastrophe zu bewahren. Ihre jüngsten Berichte sprechen von Anfälligkeiten in den industriellen Sektoren der unteren Makropole, gehen aber nicht ins Detail. Darüber hinaus sind alle Eure Diener damit beschäftigt, die Ursachen für die Krise zu erforschen ... aber niemand tut etwas, um mit deren Folgen fertigzuwerden."

languages.text: "Belli değil. Soylu haneler, suçu birbirlerinin üzerine atıyor. Saygıdeğer Achilleas Scalander'ın Scipione 84-249'da görev alan ajanları, nüfusu bu felaketten kurtarmaya çalışırken kahramanlara yaraşırcasına can vermiş. Son raporları, kovanın alt katlarındaki sınai sektörlerde bazı zayıf noktalardan bahsediyor ancak daha fazla ayrıntıya girmiyor. Tüm hizmetkârlarınız, şu anda bu krizin sonuçlarıyla ilgilendiğinden sebebini araştıramıyor."
languages.original_text: "It is still unclear. The noble houses are casting blame on one another. Agents of the esteemed Achilleas Scalander stationed in Scipione 84-249 died heroically while trying to save the population from this disaster. Their final reports mentioned some vulnerabilities in the industrial sectors of the lower hive but did not go into further detail. All your servants are currently too busy dealing with the consequences of the crisis to investigate its causes."
